level.heading: Powers of the Mayor.
level.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, all powers and authority vested by this chapter in the Authority shall remain with the Mayor until:
A majority of members of the executive board have been confirmed by the Council; and
The executive board has hired an executive director.
